item.name: Canopy Bulwark
entries: This suit of {@runeItem leaf weave|TV|+1 armor potency||assisting|TV} is composed entirely of primal-infused leaves bestowed by a {@condition dying} arboreal. The leaves display the vibrant greens of summer, as if full of life, regardless of the time that has passed since the arboreal gifted them. The armor is constantly drawing in imperceptible amounts of primal energy to help bear its wearer's burdens. You can draw deeply upon the untapped reserves of primal magic within it and infuse yourself with these energies to a limited extent, giving you a burst of quickness.
You cast {@spell haste|PC1} targeting yourself. In addition to the effects of the spell, visible primal energy surges over the armor for the duration. This has no mechanical impact.

craftReq: The initial raw materials must include leaves freely given by an arboreal.

item.name: Arboreal Wand
entries: This gnarled wand is made from the branch of an arboreal.

You cast {@spell heal|PC1} at the indicated rank. After you cast the spell, the raw primal energy stored within the arboreal from which the wand was made washes over one target you choose and tries to purify its essence. The wand attempts to counteract the lowest level affliction affecting your target. It uses your casting modifier and a counteract rank of half the wand's item level rounded up.

craftReq: Supply a casting of {@spell heal|PC1} of the appropriate level and a branch freely given by an arboreal.

item.name: Skitter Knot
entries: Carved from an arboreal's knuckle, this wooden torus can be activated despite your being {@condition unconscious}. The knot then sprouts several roots that arch over your body like a spider's legs. These lift you a few inches off the ground before Striding and carrying you with them. The roots prioritize taking you away from obvious harm, though as a reaction, an ally who speaks {@language Arboreal|B1} can command the roots to carry you to a particular point within range.

After moving, the roots continue protecting you; this counts as {@action Raise a Shield||Raising a Shield}, giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn. The roots use the {@feat Shield Block} reaction against the first physical attack against you, after which the roots crumble.
The roots carry you up to 10 feet and have Hardness 5.
The roots carry you up to 15 feet and have Hardness 10.
The roots carry you up to 20 feet and have Hardness 20.

item.trigger: You are {@condition dying} at the beginning of your turn.

item.name: Beekeeper's Smoker
entries: This device resembles a teapot with a trigger. When filled with cloth fuel (worth 1 cp) and lit, it smolders and gradually fills with smoke for 10 minutes, during which time you can squeeze the trigger to spray smoke.

entries.name: Spray Smoke
entries: You expel smoke into an adjacent 5-foot square. All creatures in that area are {@condition concealed}, and other creatures are {@condition concealed} to them. The smoke lasts for {@dice 1d4} rounds or until dispersed by strong wind.

item.name: Swarmsuit
entries: These thick, overlapping layers of clothing are coupled with a matching hat, outfitted with mesh netting around its wide brim to keep you safe from insects. You gain resistance 3 to physical damage from {@trait swarm||swarms}. {@item Explorer's clothing} altered in this way has a Dexterity cap of +2, check penalty of –1, and Speed penalty of –5 feet regardless of your Strength.

item.name: Primal Pollen
entries: This magical flower immediately grows and blooms when planted, showering the area with intoxicating pollen. Insects take a –4 penalty on Fortitude saves to resist this poison.
